page.title: 07 A JUNIOR SCHOOL DAY
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.30am. Then I have breakfast.For breakfast I have four Weetabix and a cup of tea.At 8.15am.I get washed and at 8.20am.I get dressed.At 8.30am.I catch the number 4 bus to school.It costs me 8p to go to school.It takes about five minutes and it is about 7 tenths of a mile.At 8.55am.I go into school. Assembly is at 9.00 am.At 9.30am.I have Maths.At 10.35am.we have break.After break we have English.At 12 noon we have lunch. At 12.55pm. we go back into school.At 1.00pm. we have P.E. After we have P.E. we go to swimming.We haven't got our own swimming pool so we hire Kinson swimming baths.At 3.00pm. we come back from swimming and at 3.10pm. we finish any work.At 3.30pm. we go home.
